t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: The use of Amazon proprietary words, phrases, products, etc. that directly tie into Amazon functionality or features is allowed (e.g. “Gold Box Deal Of The Day”), but requires approval from Amazon. Outside of this context, use of Amazon branded terms or similar statements are not allowed ...

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
